title: Avid Afzal
text:
I’m a Data Scientist with a background in computer engineering, bioinformatics, and cheminformatics.
My interests lie in Bayesian statistics, experimental design, deep learning, and the fusion of these disciplines to create innovative solutions.

title: Blogs
text:
Welcome to my blog page! Here you’ll find previews of my latest blog posts. Click on “Read more” to explore each post in detail.
